local_intent: Execute grasp by closing the gripper on the green bottle after aligning and reaching the computed top-grasp pose, then verify the object is held.
assumptions: Gripper is functional and empty before grasp.
Top grasp on the green bottle is feasible given clutter.
coherence_with_global: Follows global sequence: detect -> open gripper -> align -> compute top grasp (goal_pose) -> execute grasp at pose -> close gripper -> verify ObjectInGripper.
